body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bryant Motors. My name is Bryan Hall. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Bryan, my name is Marie Griffin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three two one, eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also tell me your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Marie. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Bryan.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marie. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
